poses.description: Stand at the edge of your mat, keeping your feet together. Join your palms together in front of your chest in a prayer position.
Raise your arms up and back, keeping your biceps close to your ears. Stretch your whole body upward.
Bend forward from the hips, keeping your spine straight and your palms beside your feet.
Step your right leg back, keeping your left foot between your hands. Look forward with your spine elongated.
Bring your left leg back and lift your hips, forming an inverted V-shape with your body.
Lower your knees, chest, and chin to the ground, keeping your hips slightly raised.
Slide forward and raise your chest up into a gentle backbend, keeping your elbows bent.
Lift your hips again, returning to the inverted V-shape.
Step your right foot forward between your hands, keeping your left knee on the ground and looking forward.
Bring your left foot forward to join the right, and bend forward from the hips with your palms beside your feet.
Raise your arms up and back, keeping your biceps close to your ears and stretching your whole body upward.
Bring your arms down and join your palms together in front of your chest, returning to a prayer position.
